title: 2 Bedroom in Westminster+asy access to Boulder, Louisville, and Arvada
posting_body: This apartment complex is a professionally managed property offering 2 bedroom units in Westminster, just northwest of Denver.
Amenities include in-wall air conditioners (select units), on-site laundry facilities, and off street parking.
The city of Westminster is conveniently located northwest of Denver, with easy access to Boulder, Louisville, and Arvada, as well as parks and open spaces, including Standley Lake.
From the quaint Historic Westminster Arts District to the modern Westminster Promenade, this city offers a variety of retail, dining, and entertainment opportunities.
